DUTIES OF THE COMMISSION. The Commission is tasked with reviewing analyses of the current and long-term financial condition of the Medicare trust funds, identifying potential threats to their solvency, and analyzing solutions to ensure the financial integrity of the Medicare Program and provision of health benefits.
